tachyon.util.network

Class NetworkAddressUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.util.network.NetworkAddressUtils

  • public final class NetworkAddressUtils
extends Object
    Common network address related utilities shared by all components in Tachyon.

      • assertValidPort

      • assertValidPort

      • getConnectAddress

        public static InetSocketAddress getConnectAddress(NetworkAddressUtils.ServiceType service,
                                  TachyonConf conf)
        Helper method to get the InetSocketAddress address for client to communicate with the service.
        Parameters:
        service - the service name used to connect
        conf - the configuration of Tachyon
        Returns:
        the service address that a client (typically outside the service machine) uses to communicate with service.

      • getConnectHost

        public static String getConnectHost(NetworkAddressUtils.ServiceType service,
                    TachyonConf conf)
        Provides an externally resolvable hostname for client to communicate with the service. If the hostname is not explicitly specified, Tachyon will try to use the bind host. If the bind host is wildcard, Tachyon will automatically determine an appropriate hostname from local machine. The various possibilities shown in the following table:
        Hostname Scenarios
        Specified Hostname Specified Bind Host Returned Connect Host
        hostname hostname hostname
        not defined hostname hostname
        hostname 0.0.0.0 or not defined hostname
        not defined 0.0.0.0 or not defined localhost
        Parameters:
        service - Service type used to connect
        conf - Tachyon configuration used to look up the host resolution timeout
        Returns:
        the externally resolvable hostname that the client can use to communicate with the service.

      • getPort

        public static int getPort(NetworkAddressUtils.ServiceType service,
          TachyonConf conf)
        Gets the port number on a given service type. If user defined port number is not explicitly specified, Tachyon will use the default service port.
        Parameters:
        service - Service type used to connect
        conf - Tachyon configuration
        Returns:
        the service port number

      • getBindAddress

        public static InetSocketAddress getBindAddress(NetworkAddressUtils.ServiceType service,
                               TachyonConf conf)
        Helper method to get the InetSocketAddress bind address on a given service.

        Host bind information searching order:

        1. System properties or environment variables via tachyon-env.sh
        2. Default properties via tachyon-default.properties file
        3. A externally resolvable local hostname for the host this JVM is running on
        Parameters:
        service - the service name used to connect
        conf - the configuration of Tachyon
        Returns:
        the InetSocketAddress the service will bind to

      • getLocalHostName

        public static String getLocalHostName(TachyonConf conf)
        Gets a local host name for the host this JVM is running on
        Parameters:
        conf - Tachyon configuration used to look up the host resolution timeout
        Returns:
        the local host name, which is not based on a loopback ip address

      • getLocalHostName

        public static String getLocalHostName(int timeout)
        Gets a local host name for the host this JVM is running on
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds to use for checking that a possible local host is reachable
        Returns:
        the local host name, which is not based on a loopback ip address

      • getLocalIpAddress

        public static String getLocalIpAddress(TachyonConf conf)
        Gets a local IP address for the host this JVM is running on
        Parameters:
        conf - Tachyon configuration
        Returns:
        the local ip address, which is not a loopback address and is reachable

      • getLocalIpAddress

        public static String getLocalIpAddress(int timeout)
        Gets a local IP address for the host this JVM is running on
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds to use for checking that a possible local IP is reachable
        Returns:
        the local ip address, which is not a loopback address and is reachable

      • replaceHostName

        public static TachyonURI replaceHostName(TachyonURI path)
                                  throws UnknownHostException
        Replaces and resolves the hostname in a given address or path string.
        Parameters:
        path - an address or path string, e.g., "hdfs://host:port/dir", "file:///dir", "/dir".
        Returns:
        an address or path string with hostname resolved, or the original path intact if no hostname is embedded, or null if the given path is null or empty.
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if the hostname cannot be resolved.

      • resolveHostName

        public static String resolveHostName(String hostname)
                              throws UnknownHostException
        Resolves a given hostname by a canonical hostname. When a hostname alias (e.g., those specified in /etc/hosts) is given, the alias may not be resolvable on other hosts in a cluster unless the same alias is defined there. In this situation, loadufs would break.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the input hostname, which could be an alias.
        Returns:
        the canonical form of the hostname, or null if it is null or empty
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if the given hostname cannot be resolved.

      • getFqdnHost

        public static String getFqdnHost(InetSocketAddress addr)
        Get FQDN(Full Qualified Domain Name) from Java representations of network address, except String representation which should be handled by #resolveHostName(String hostname) which will handle the situation where hostname is null.
        Parameters:
        addr - the input network address representation, can not be null
        Returns:
        the resolved FQDN host name

      • getFqdnHost

        public static String getFqdnHost(NetAddress addr)
                          throws UnknownHostException
        Gets FQDN(Full Qualified Domain Name) from Tachyon representation of network address.
        Parameters:
        addr - the input network address representation
        Returns:
        the resolved FQDN host name
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if the host is not known

      • getThriftPort

        public static int getThriftPort(org.apache.thrift.transport.TServerSocket thriftSocket)
        Gets the port for the underline socket. This function calls getThriftSocket(org.apache.thrift.transport.TServerSocket), so reflection will be used to get the port.
        See Also:
        getThriftSocket(org.apache.thrift.transport.TServerSocket)

      • getThriftSocket

        public static ServerSocket getThriftSocket(org.apache.thrift.transport.TServerSocket thriftSocket)
        Extracts the port from the thrift socket. As of thrift 0.9, the internal socket used is not exposed in the API, so this function will use reflection to get access to it.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if reflection calls fail

      • parseInetSocketAddress

        public static InetSocketAddress parseInetSocketAddress(String address)
                                                throws IOException
        Parses InetSocketAddress from a String.
        Parameters:
        address - socket address to parse
        Returns:
        InetSocketAddress of the String
        Throws:
        IOException - if the socket address is invalid
